roleset.name: combine
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to marry.01. Marry.01 is a member of VN classes amalgamate-22.2-3-1-1 and marry-36.2. Framed by Katie.

example.name: half of the whole
example.text: She is married and has 4 children

example.name: arg 1 as the whole
example.text: They was married by the church.
